T02TD3193E:202b-5: sngar bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi mthar thug par rnam par bsgoms la //
T02TD3193E:202b-6: padma dang zla ba la sa bon t'am yongs su gyur pa las sa bon t'am gi snying po dang ldan pa'i autpala'i mchog go //
T02TD3193E:202b-7: de dag las yongs su grub pa'i sngon mo don yod grub pa dbu rgyan la gnas pa phyag g-yas dang g-yon gyis mchog sbyin pa dang /
T02TD3193E:202b-9: mya ngan med la dga' ma dang /
T02TD3193E:202b-10: 'od zer can dang ral gcig ma mdun dang g-yas dang g-yon gyi sa'i cha la ste /
T02TD3193E:202b-11: lha'i bu mo gzhon nu rgyan rnams dang ldan par bsgoms la /
T02TD3193E:202b-12: ye shes sems dpa' dang lhan cig gcig tu byas te /
T02TD3193E:202b-13: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02TD3193E:202b-14: zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas la /
T02TD3193E:202b-15: de yid la byed pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod par rgyu bar bya ba'o //
T02TD3193E:202b-16: 'phags ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so /
T02TD3193E:203a-0: // / @203a * // aa bha ya'i zhal snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
